headline.main: MORGENTHAU SR. ASKS UNITED U.S. EFFORT; Former Envoy Says Rallying of All Resources Is Needed Now

lead_paragraph: Henry Morgenthau Sr., former United States Ambassador to Turkey and father of the Secretary of the Treasury, asserted yesterday that America must put to use "every ounce of the intelligence, the efficiency, and the industrial resources of which this huge, rich country is capable," if it is to preserve the civilization of which America and Great Britain are representative.
abstract: united effort to save Anglo-Amer civilization urged by H Morgenthau Sr
